Questions_Quiz.question: Which of the following is a true headline

options.optiona: Donald Trump believes Covid was created by aliens
options.optionc: Covid-19 kills thousands of people in the USA
options.optiond: Covid-19 is all a democratic hoax

Questions_Quiz.correct_answers: Covid-19 kills thousands of people in the USA
Questions_Quiz.explanation: The correct answers is option b

Questions_Quiz.question: Select headlines you've seen about Miley Cyrus that are true

options.optionc: Miley does not care about people not as privledges as her
options.optiond: Miley wants kids to do drugs

Questions_Quiz.correct_answers: Miley does drugsMiley has gotted a divorce
Questions_Quiz.explanation: Celebrities are very often get painted in a specific light that makes us more inclined to believe related articles. Miley has actually said in a recent interview that alcoohol and drugs has damanged her voice and she rarely does it anymore.
